title: How to Change Car Oil
steps: Warm up the engine for a few minutes, then turn it off.
Lift the car using a jack and secure it with jack stands.
Place a drain pan under the oil pan and remove the drain plug.
Let the old oil completely drain out.
Remove the old oil filter using an oil filter wrench.
Apply a bit of new oil to the gasket of the new filter and install it.
Reinsert and tighten the drain plug.
Pour in new oil using a funnel.
Start the engine and check for leaks.
Check the dipstick and top off if necessary. Dispose of used oil properly.
